title: Ric Edelman Talks Bitcoin, Digital Assets and Wealth Management
description: Historically, advisors were routinely asked "why are you recommending Bitcoin?" says the founder of the Digital Assets Council of Financial Professionals. "The question is now becoming, why aren't you?"
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Historically, advisors were routinely asked "why are you recommending Bitcoin?" says the founder of the Digital Assets Council of Financial Professionals. "The question is now becoming, why aren't you?"
